resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Drythelm of Northumbria: Scene, Vision, assailed by Demons -- Drythelm of Northumbria, nimbed, tonsured, wearing monk’s habit, departing to left away from group of five horned and winged devils, with claw feet, all issuing flames from mouth and standing in flames, all raising instruments of torture or weapons, including, knife, scissors, two spears, and scimitar. At right, nimbed angel, with hands extended, flying over group of nude male souls, some tonsured, all engulfed in flames. Scene framed by two trees.
resource.chars:
Drythelm of Northumbria: Scene, Vision, assailed by Demons -- Drythelm of Northumbria, nimbed, tonsured, wearing monk’s habit, departing to left away from group of five horned and winged devils, with claw feet, all issuing flames from mouth and standing in flames, all raising instruments of torture or weapons, including, knife, scissors, two spears, and scimitar.
At right, nimbed angel, with hands extended, flying over group of nude male souls, some tonsured, all engulfed in flames.
Scene framed by two trees.
